name: InvasivePneumococcalDiseaseTestsForStreptococcusPneumoniaeNucleicAcid
title: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Streptococcus pneumoniae nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: streptococcus pneumoniae probe/non-probe;  

LOINC search: 'Streptococcus pneumoniae nucleic acid -culture'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
